title: Does love exist in a vacuum? - Quora

response.answer_text: >>>Does love exist in a vacuum?<<< Unfortunately you are proclaiming a categorical mis-take: Love and any other emotion/sensation/opinion such as: Space, time, mass, energy, forces, accelerations (such as gravity), laws, G-Ds are undetectable. Love and any other emotion/sensation/opinion such as: Space, time, mass, energy, forces, accelerations (such as gravity), laws, G-Ds are made up TO/ON/OF/ABOUT the material universe. Love and any other emotion/sensation/opinion such as: Space, time, mass, energy, forces, accelerations (such as gravity), laws, G-Ds they do not exist: NOT as SUCH, NOT them-SELVES, NOT on their OWN.Even the measur-ability of space, time, mass, energy forces, accelerations (such as gravity), is NOT tantamount to any detect-ability of space, time, mass, energy, forces, accelerations (such as gravity). All that DOES exist in this respect, WAS invented, DID emerge, is detectable, it is utterations = manifestations = assertions = object-IFICATIONS OF Love and any other emotion/sensation/opinion such as: Space, time, mass, energy, forces, accelerations (such as gravity), laws and G-Ds. The object-IFICATIONS, they are existing, detectable, (quite) permanent, durable, and they [have our brain] elicit, make up, fabricate, fake that Love and any other emotion/sensation/opinion such as: Space, time, mass, energy, forces, accelerations (such as gravity), laws and G-Ds be existing - as such, on their own, them-selves.

The perfect vacuum is both eternal (having always existed) and infinite. Love does exist in a vacuum. God is love and his name is Jehovah. The vacuum is the infinite abyss of nothingness. Love exists because God is and always has been and will be love. So, love exists because God exists. He has always existed in the vacuum of nothingness. From there he created all of creation. God is love in the vacuum of nothingness and mankind has love on earth in the vacuum of space. 3) The eternal and infinite dark abyss of the vacuum of nothingness engulfs God who is love. God is in the midst of the infinite darkness of nothingness. “God is love” 1Jo 4:8 “God is light” 1Jo 1:5 “depths (:deeps), in dark places, in a large abyss (:endless vacuum of nothingness)…far away” Ps 88:6, 8 Similar to how God has always existed, as light shining out of the darkness of the infinite vacuum of the abyss of nothingness he caused light from the sun, within the dark vacuum of space, to shine within the dark earth. “the light shine out of darkness” 2Co 4:6 2) The eternal God who is love in and as heaven, the spiritual engulfs the vacuum of space which he created “Ge 19:24 “In the beginning God created the heavens (:the vast vacuum of space)” Ge 1:1 “the heaven (:the vacuum of space) of the heavens (:both sky and space) themselves cannot contain (:hold or house) you (:God)” 2Ch 6:18 “on the vault (:curvature) of heaven (:sky figuratively; the vacuum of space literally) he (:God) walks about.” Job 22:14 The spiritual heavens is above everywhere on the sphere of the earth. Therefore, heaven where God, who is love, lives engulfs the vacuum of space with the earth within it. “Jesus (:the Son of God) spoke again…saying:…“You (:Pilate as a human; people) are from the realms below (:vast physical cosmos in which the earth lies); I am from the realms above (:vast spiritual heavens)…not from this world (:within the vacuum of the cosmos on earth)” Joh 8:23 “passed through the heavens (sky and the vacuum of space into the spiritual heaven)” Heb 4:14 “ascended far above all the (physical) heavens (:the great wide skies and the vast vacuum of space)” Eph 4:10 1 The vacuum of space engulfs the earth on which mankind has and displays love “In the beginning God created the heavens (:vacuum of space) and the earth (within it)” Ge 1:1 “raise your eyes (above) to the heavens (vacuum of space) and indeed see…the stars, all the army of the heavens” De 4:19 “eye has not seen and ear has not heard, neither have there been conceived in the heart of man the things that God has prepared for those who [love] him (on earth in the vacuum of space)” 1Co 2:9

love is the vacuum that sucks up everything into it with no discernment or preference; everything that is exists because of love- even that which appears inadequate or unlovable; the perception itself manifest inside love. “Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no account of wrongs. Love takes no pleasure in evil, but rejoices in the truth. It bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things.”

Well not really, vacuum will soon will kill you, no matter what, even if you have oxygen reserves or space-suit or whatever. Love won’t work without human life to process this concept, thus the answer: no, it doesn’t.
Ove is human feeling and is related to Human Being only.
